title: T332 Helmar Stamp HOF'ers for sale: Bresnahan, Evers, Griffith, Jennings, Tinker, Wallace
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T332 Helmar Stamp HOF'ers for sale: Bresnahan, Evers, Griffith, Jennings, Tinker, Wallace
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
Offered is a great selection of some of the toughest HOF'ers from the 1911 T332 Helmar stamp set: Bresnahan (St. Louis), Evers (Chicago), Griffith (Washington), Jennings (Detroit), Tinker (Chicago), and Wallace (St. Louis). Their scarcity pales in comparison to their T206 counterparts. These six comprise about 25% of the HOF'ers in the T332 set. See the scans for condition. Note that the Tinker and the Wallace each have another (non-baseball) stamp affixed to the reverse, as is often seen with Helmars. The Jennings has staining. I will also include an off-condition Tinker (not pictured) for free. $360 shipped.
